name: Cisco | IOS | Network | DOCSIS | Upstream Input Power Level Changed (SYSLOG)
description: %UBR7100-5-USIPLCHG: Interface Cable1/0 U3, input power level changed to 1 dBmV
event_class__name: Network | DOCSIS | Upstream Input Power Level Changed

patterns.value_re: %UBR\d+00-5-(?:USIPLCHG|USIPLFIX): Interface (?P<interface>\S+) U(?P<upstream>\d+), input power level (?:changed to|fixed at) (?P<power>\d+) dBmV
